title: A bug with the boots
body: I know its not a big deal but a little weird so ill tell u the story. So im just normally playing a game until i came over a bug where i bought berserker greaves with homeguards and then bought the furor's enchant, I still had the homeguard enchant out of the base and still had the furor enchant so i went back to check if it still gave me the boost and it didnt i also tried with other boots and it also worked the same way. I HOPED THIS HELPED
